definitions.text: any of numerous climbing plants of the genus Vanilla having fleshy leaves and clusters of large waxy highly fragrant white or green or topaz flowers
a flavoring prepared from vanilla beans macerated in alcohol (or imitating vanilla beans)
a distinctive fragrant flavor characteristic of vanilla beans
plain and without any extras or adornments
examples: the most common type of bond is the straight or plain vanilla bond
the basic car is known as the vanilla version
